column4: by the way: is it save when using chmod 775 for all files in home-dir...?
ah, but wijnand then u cant change files
how save is it? what about hackers?
so how to change all my directories in 755 and all my files in to 644 in one step using the terminal...?
you don't want to change permissions of everything.... don't touch anything that isn't yours etc.
all the files in the home/math dir :)
stuff in your home dir should be ok
beasty, it doesn't no, but the guide should explain how to install everything important
that's what I was thinking about
I just wouldn't change things from defaults... they're defaults for a reason :)
